title: Improve bio section visual hierarchy
description: Homepage bio is a single dense paragraph that's hard to scan. Break into 2-3 shorter paragraphs or add visual elements to improve readability. Located in `src/pages/index.astro:61-71`.

title: Add hover effects to post links
description:
Post list items have no visual feedback on hover. Add subtle hover states like:
- Background color change
- Link color transition
- Slight transform/scale
Affects `post-preview.astro` and homepage post list styling.

title: Add descriptions to homepage post list
description: Homepage post list only shows date+title while blog listing page shows descriptions. The `post-preview.astro` component has `withDesc` prop that defaults to false. Add `withDesc={true}` to homepage in `src/pages/index.astro:80`.

title: Commit or remove placeholder images
description:
5 placeholder images created during design review need to be either:
1. Replaced with real screenshots
2. Committed as temporary placeholders
3. Posts marked as draft until images ready

Files:
- src/content/post/placeholder-bd-capture-popup.png
- src/content/post/placeholder-confirmation.png
- src/content/post/placeholder-worktrees.png
- src/content/post/placeholder-iterations.png
- src/content/post/placeholder-bd-find-all-popup.png

title: Fix broken Openring section
description: The 'On the Web' section on homepage shows only 'Generated by Open Ring' with no content. The `_openring` array in `src/components/openring.astro:12` is empty. Either populate with data or remove the section entirely.

title: Limit homepage post count
description:
Homepage shows all posts, making page very long. Suggest:
- Limit to 5-10 recent posts
- Add 'View all posts â†’' link to /posts/

Improves scannability and homepage focus.

title: Hide draft posts in production
description:
Draft posts showing with '(Draft)' label on homepage and blog listing. Should these be hidden in production builds?

Currently visible:
- DVC Import URL: Solving the Anonymous Access Puzzle
- The State of Reproducible Scripts
- Hosting a UCSC Genome Browser Data Hub on Hugging Face

May be intentional for dev preview - confirm desired behavior.

title: Fix empty Speaking page
description:
Speaking page shows 'My Conference Talks' heading with no content - feels broken. Either:
1. Add talks data from past conferences
2. Hide from nav until content is ready
3. Add placeholder 'Coming soon' message

Location: src/pages/speaking.astro

title: Enhance social icons styling
description:
Social icons are small (24px h-6 w-6) with minimal hover feedback. Suggestions:
- Increase size to 28-32px (h-7 w-7 or h-8 w-8)
- Add hover color transition
- Located in `src/components/social-list.astro:66`
